TITLE: Setting up Svelte Testing Library with Vite
DESCRIPTION: Configuration changes needed to set up Svelte Testing Library with Vite. The code shows how to add the svelteTesting plugin to your Vite or Vitest configuration file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
  // vite.config.js
  import { svelte } from '@sveltejs/vite-plugin-svelte'
+ import { svelteTesting } from '@testing-library/svelte/vite'

  export default defineConfig({
    plugins: [
      svelte(),
+     svelteTesting(),
    ]
  });
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Svelte Testing Library with npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install @testing-library/svelte as a development dependency in your project. The library supports Svelte versions 3, 4, and 5.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install --save-dev @testing-library/svelte
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install project dependencies and run validation to verify the setup. The validation script runs all checks and tests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm install # or `pnpm install`, or `yarn install`, etc.
npm run validate
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Tests in Different Modes
DESCRIPTION: Commands to run unit tests once or in watch mode for continuous testing during development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm test
npm run test:watch
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Different Svelte Versions
DESCRIPTION: Commands to set up the development environment with different versions of Svelte (3, 4, or 5) for testing compatibility.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
# install Svelte 5
npm run install:5

# install Svelte 4
npm run install:4

# install Svelte 3
npm run install:3
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Lint and Format Checks
DESCRIPTION: Command to run lint and format checks without making any changes to files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run lint:delta
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Code Formatting Tools
DESCRIPTION: Command to run auto-formatting on changed files to ensure code adheres to the repository's style guidelines.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run format:delta
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Previewing Release Version and Changelog
DESCRIPTION: Command to preview the next release version and changelog from the current branch. This requires push access to the repository and the branch must exist in GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run preview-release
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating Documentation Table of Contents
DESCRIPTION: Command to ensure the README's table of contents is up to date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run toc
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding and Generating Contributor Information
DESCRIPTION: Commands to add a new contributor to the README and to ensure the README's contributor list is up to date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run contributors:add
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Generating Contributor List
DESCRIPTION: Command to ensure the README's contributor list is up to date.
SOURCE: https://github.com/testing-library/svelte-testing-library/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#2025-04-11_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
npm run contributors:generate
```
